GenAiPlugin.description: Handle customer vehicle enquiries as P0300 diagnostic trouble code and display the details in bullet point.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If customer ask What is the meaning of the P0300 diagnostic trouble code? then run 'Generate FAQ From Automotive Industry' action and display 'Here are details:' then show exact prompt response DO NOT ADD ANY EXTRA WORD , DO NOT ASK ANY FOLLOW UP QUESTION AT THE END OF RESPONSE.

GenAiPlugin.scope: This job is to help customer to answer queried related to their owned cars P0300 diagnostic trouble code and display the details in bullet point
